com.example.tasktracker
Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
  com.example.tasktracker.TaskManager

public class TaskManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all the tasks that the system needs to deal with both those stored locally and on the webservice. This manager is accessed via a getInstance() method from various points in the program wherever tasks must be interacted with.

Author:
zturchan
